sentences.sentence: Top left, part of the ignition exciter is visible.
sentences.translation: 左上角，在点火励磁部分是可见的。

sentences.sentence: Double eccentric shaft vibration exciter is the source of linear vibration.
sentences.translation: 振动给料机由双偏心轴激振器提供直线振动源。

sentences.sentence: Their own traffic generation exciter system, and you will get paid 50% instantly!
